title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Write a program that reads two integers and prints their sum.

templates.python:
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
print(a + b)
templates.java: import java.util.*;class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt();System.out.println(a+b);}}

title: Find Maximum
description: Read N integers and print the maximum value among them.

templates.python:
n = int(input())
nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(max(nums))
templates.java: import java.util.*;class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();int max=Integer.MIN_VALUE;for(int i=0;i<n;i++){int x=sc.nextInt();if(x>max)max=x;}System.out.println(max);}}

title: Factorial
description: Write a program to compute factorial of a number N.

templates.python:
n=int(input())
res=1
for i in range(1,n+1):res*=i
print(res)
templates.java: import java.util.*;class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();long res=1;for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)res*=i;System.out.println(res);}}
